content: I'm thinking of getting a desk with a reclaimed wood top, so a matte finish might be a good choice. I've been doing a lot of work from home lately, and I've realized that my current desk is just too small. I've been feeling a bit cramped and uncomfortable, which is affecting my productivity. That's why I'm excited to find a new desk that will give me more space and comfort. Speaking of comfort, I recently rearranged my living room furniture to make the room feel more spacious, and it's made a big difference. I swapped the positions of my couch and TV stand, and got rid of an old coffee table that was taking up too much space.
